name: Darkspace Arena Ultra II
description:
Entry for Ludum Dare 44 JAM
Theme : Your life is currency

Raptured by obscure cosmic forces, you have to fight in a TV show to redeem your freedom.
Be prepared to pay with your life. Audience wants blood.
ZQSD / Arrows :  MOVE
SPACE                    :  SHOOT / ACTIVATE SHOP / BUY
ESC                          :  ESCAPE SHOP

Thanks for playing !
Toffanim & Schoenbr
